education.description: Activities and Societies: • Wing Representative, MT Hall, 2022-23 • Mentor at Student Welfare Group 2021-23 • Gold-winning team at the women's open (IIT) kho-kho tournament held in February 2022. •Executive Member at Gopali Youth Welfare Society from April 2019 to May 2021 • Member of the National Sports Organization (NSO) in Yoga from July 2019 to April 2021. • Associate Member at Spring Fest 2020 Specialization in Manufacturing Science and Engineering and, Micro-Specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Application

education.title: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya (JNV)
education.description: Activities and Societies: • Was NCC Cadet for 2015-2016 of NCC Directorate Bihar & Jharkhand and Unit 34 Bihar Bn NCC. • Acquired 2nd position in SA Firing in June 2015 and 3rd position in Mini Marathon Run (5Km) on 24thJan 2016 organized by NCC. • Participated in the 1st International Day of Yoga on 21st June 2015. • 2nd position in the 100-meter race held during an annual sports event in December 2015. • Won 3 gold medals and annual sportswomen of the year trophy during an annual sports event in December 2014.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: • Was NCC Cadet for 2015-2016 of NCC Directorate Bihar & Jharkhand and Unit 34 Bihar Bn NCC. • Acquired 2nd position in SA Firing in June 2015 and 3rd position in Mini Marathon Run (5Km) on 24thJan 2016 organized by NCC. • Participated in the 1st International Day of Yoga on 21st June 2015. • 2nd position in the 100-meter race held during an annual sports event in December 2015. • Won 3 gold medals and annual sportswomen of the year trophy during an annual sports event in December 2014.

certifications.title: Search Engine for Coding Questions | Live Hackathon

projects: [{"title":"DSA Search Engine","start_date":"May 2022","end_date":"May 2022","description":"This web development project basically is building a Search Engine dedicated to finding Data Structure and Algorithm problems.The project is on a search engine which takes an input from a user in the search box and returns top 10 matches of DSA Problem from the database for this project consists of around 1500 questions. This project was built using python, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and CSS."}]
